messages.title: Southport's Independence battle
messages.content: Local champion John Pugh is fighting back, after Lib Dem losses nationally...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: John Pugh is fighting against our empty shops, and to protect police numbers and to secure extra funds for Southport's NHS
John Pugh is working to get property owners to provide better parking

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour right out of Southport contest after collapse in vote last time

issues.health: securing extra funds for Southport's NHS

housing.content: John Pugh is working to get property owners to provide better parking

leaflet.personalStatement: I've proved my passion for Southport, first as a councillor, then as an MP.
